SELECT
AVG(a.avg_air_temperature) as avg_value, MAX(c.air_temperature) as max_value, MIN(c.air_temperature) as min_value
AVG(a.avg_air_humidity) as avg_value, MAX(c.air_humidity) as max_value, MIN(c.air_humidity) as min_value
AVG(a.avg_soil_temperature) as avg_value, MAX(c.soil_temperature) as max_value, MIN(c.soil_temperature) as min_value
AVG(a.avg_soil_humidity) as avg_value, MAX(c.soil_humidity) as max_value, MIN(c.soil_humidity) as min_value
AVG(a.avg_ill_intensity) as avg_value, MAX(c.ill_intensity) as max_value, MIN(c.ill_intensity) as min_value
AVG(a.avg_rainfall) as avg_value, MAX(c.rainfall) as max_value, MIN(c.rainfall) as min_value
AVG(a.avg_soil_ph) as avg_value, MAX(c.soil_ph) as max_value, MIN(c.soil_ph) as min_value
AVG(a.avg_wind_speed) as avg_value, MAX(c.wind_speed) as max_value, MIN(c.wind_speed) as min_value
FROM ddwb_env_dayavg a LEFT JOIN ddwb_equipment b ON a.equipment_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ddwb_env_monitor c ON c.equipment_id = b.id
DATE_SUB( CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 7 DAY ) <= date( a.monitor_time )
DATE_SUB( CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 30 DAY ) <= date( a.monitor_time )
AND b.base_id = #{baseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.monitor_time
